objects.description: [Ember Bear](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1003) is associated with [WhisperGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0689) use against multiple victims in Ukraine.(Citation: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor)(Citation: CrowdStrike Ember Bear Profile March 2022)(Citation: Mandiant UNC2589 March 2022)
